feed.title: Track Awesome Actions Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome actions to use on GitHub

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Sep 01, 2024
entry.content:
Utility / Docker Container Actions

  • Interactive Inputs - Runtime workflow inputs (⭐19) - Add dynamic inputs at runtime for your GitHub Actions workflows

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Nov 01, 2023
entry.content:
Static Analysis / Linting

  • Run stolt/lean-package-validator to ensure your package has only the required runtime artifacts (⭐0)

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Aug 29, 2020

  • Pull Request Stats (⭐382) - Print relevant stats about reviewers.

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Aug 28, 2020
entry.content:
Utility / Docker Container Actions

  • Pull the New Go Module Version Into the Proxy Cache (⭐26) - Ensures the latest version of your Go module is in the proxy cache. Also updates the pkg.go.dev documentation upon release.
  • Delete Run Artifacts - Deletes all artifacts at the end of a workflow run.
  • GitHub Environment Variables Action (⭐188) - Expose environment variables such as the branch/tag name, repository slug, and ref slug.

Pull Requests / Code Coverage

  • Set PR Reviewers Based on Assignees (⭐123)
  • Open or Update PR on Branch Push (with Branch Selection) (⭐173)
  • Automatically Rebase a PR (⭐697)
  • Label PR once it has a Specified Number of Approvals (⭐192)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Matched File Patterns (⭐63)
  • Auto-Approve PRs (⭐448)
  • Automatically add Reviewers to PR based on the Configuration File (⭐351)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Branch Name Patterns (⭐258)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Total Size of the Diff (⭐92)
  • Automatically merge PRs That Are Ready (⭐892)
  • Verify That PRs Contain a Ticket Reference (⭐76)
  • Create a PR for Changes to your Repository in the Actions Workspace (⭐2.4k)
  • Lint a PR (⭐120)
  • ChatOps for PRs (⭐75)
  • Prefix Title and Body of a PR Based on Text Extracted from Branch Name (⭐82)
  • Merge Pal - Automatically Update and Merge PRs (⭐32)
  • Pull Request Stuck Notifier
  • Annotate a GitHub Pull Request Based on a Checkstyle XML-Report (⭐195)

Notifications and Messages / Code Coverage

  • Send an SMS from GitHub Actions using Clockworksms (⭐3)

Deployment / Docker

  • Convert Branch or Tag Name Into Docker-Compatible Image Tag (⭐5)
  • Update a Container Repository Description From README.md - Supported Registries: Docker Hub, Quay, Harbor.

Machine Learning Ops / Terraform

  • Automatically Dockerize A Data-Science Repo As A Jupyter Server (⭐145)
  • Azure Machine Learning With GitHub Actions (⭐130)

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Aug 27, 2020
entry.content:
GitHub Tools and Management / Docker Container Actions

  • Create/Update/Delete a GitHub Wiki Page Based on Any File (⭐82)

  • Manage Labels on GitHub (create/rename/update/delete) as Code (⭐151)

Utility / Docker Container Actions

  • Upload and Scan Files with VirusTotal (⭐186)
  • Import a GPG Key (⭐352)
  • Compress with UPX (⭐61) - The Ultimate Packer for eXecutables.

Utility / Dependencies

  • Install NPM Dependencies with Caching (⭐668)
  • Highlight New NPM Dependencies (⭐27) - Comments on pull requests newly added NPM dependencies information.
  • Cache NPM Dependencies (⭐19)
  • Cache Yarn Dependencies (⭐92)

Static Analysis / Linting

  • Validate Fastlane Supply Metadata Against the Play Store Guidelines (⭐25)

Pull Requests / Code Coverage

  • Ticket Check Action (⭐50) - Automatically add a ticket or issue number to the start of all Pull Request titles.
  • Pull Request Landmines (⭐33)

GitHub Pages / Code Coverage

  • Deploy to GitHub Pages with Advanced Settings (⭐480)

Deployment / Kubernetes

  • Create a Kubernetes Cluster for Testing Using Krucible (⭐4)

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Jan 11, 2020
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • Official Actions organization
    • actions/virtual-environments (⭐11k) - GitHub Actions virtual environments.
    • actions/runner (⭐5.4k) - The Runner for GitHub Actions.

Create your Actions / JavaScript and TypeScript Actions

entry.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Nov 02, 2019
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • GitHub Blog Announcement

Workflow Examples

  • actions/starter-workflows (⭐10k) - Starter workflow management.
  • actions/example-services (⭐252) - Example workflows using service containers.

Official Actions / Workflow Tool Actions

  • actions/checkout (⭐6.7k) - Setup your repository on your workflow.
  • actions/upload-artifact (⭐3.6k) - Upload artifacts from your workflow.
  • actions/download-artifact (⭐1.6k) - Download artifacts from your build.
  • actions/cache (⭐4.9k) - Cache dependencies and build outputs in GitHub Actions.
  • actions/github-script (⭐4.6k) - Write a script for GitHub API and the workflow contexts.

Official Actions / Actions for GitHub Automation

  • actions/create-release (⭐1.4k) - An Action to create releases via the GitHub Release API.
  • actions/upload-release-asset (⭐703) - An Action to upload a release asset via the GitHub Release API.
  • actions/first-interaction (⭐795) - An action for filtering pull requests and issues from first-time contributors.
  • actions/stale (⭐1.5k) - Marks issues and pull requests that have not had recent interaction.
  • actions/labeler (⭐2.2k) - An action for automatically labelling pull requests.

Official Actions / Setup Actions

  • actions/setup-node: Node.js (⭐4.3k)
  • actions/setup-python: Python (⭐1.9k)
  • actions/setup-go: Go (⭐1.5k)
  • actions/setup-dotnet: .NET core sdk (⭐1k)
  • actions/setup-haskell: Haskell (GHC and Cabal) (⭐71)
  • actions/setup-java: Java (⭐1.7k)
  • actions/setup-ruby: Ruby (⭐175)
  • actions/setup-elixir: Elixir (⭐154)

Create your Actions / JavaScript and TypeScript Actions

  • actions/toolkit (⭐5.4k) - The GitHub ToolKit for developing GitHub Actions.
  • actions/hello-world-javascript-action (⭐273) - A template to demonstrate how to build a JavaScript action.
  • actions/javascript-action (⭐1.1k) - Create a JavaScript Action.
  • actions/typescript-action (⭐2.3k) - Create a TypeScript Action.

Create your Actions / Docker Container Actions

  • actions/hello-world-docker-action (⭐176) - A template to demonstrate how to build a Docker action.
  • actions/container-toolkit-action (⭐138) - Template repo for creating container actions using actions/toolkit.

Tutorials / Terraform

  • Working with GitHub Actions
